alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:03PM HST until February 18 at 1:15PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... At 1203 PM HST, the Hanalei River gage reported a rapid rise in water level. The river is still expected to begin inundating Kuhio Highway near Hanalei Bridge. Areas of heavy rainfall with rates of 1 to 2 inches were still moving over is island from the southeast. Streams and roads in east Kauai will also be impacted by runoff. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Stream Gauges. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lihue, Kapaa, Kalaheo, Princeville, Kilauea, North Fork Wailua Trails, Wailua Homesteads, Hanalei, Wailua, Lawai, Wainiha, Koloa, Haena, Kokee State Park, Anahola, Poipu, Hanapepe, and Na Pali State Park. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry. Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown.
